afnVxYwyGaI0U4NI.name: Massive Retaliation (Fear Effect)
afnVxYwyGaI0U4NI.description: At 15th level when you smite a target or critically hit them with a weapon attack they must make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened until the end of their next turn. Whenever you reduce a creature to 0 hit points all hostile creatures within 30ft of the creature you felled must make a Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn.
